content: welcome baby with this knit blanket featuring warm and gentle tones stitched in red heart super saver o go pairs of slipped stitches in an alternating pattern create a fascinating honeycomb texture it s a great way to combine the self-striping o go with a solid o go finished with garter stitch edges this pattern also features stocking stitch slipped stitches plus simple increases and decreases for borders it s the perfect blankie for naptime materials size u s 9 5 5 mm circular knitting needle 36 91 5 cm long yarns for model red heart® super saver® o go™ solids 7 oz/197 g 364 yds/333 m prints 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m main color mc white 7100 3 o gos contrast a baby rainbow 7175 3 o gos
